calendar.description: Senate Government Operations and Political Subdivisions Hearing

hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>requires the state treasurer to complete a precious metals study for two additional years;<hr><ltbullet>requires the state treasurer to issue one or more requests for proposals for the creation and operation of a precious metals-backed electronic payment system;<hr><ltbullet>establishes requirements for the precious metals-backed electronic payment system; and<hr><ltbullet>requires the state treasurer to annually report to the Revenue and Taxation Interim Committee regarding the precious metals-backed electronic payment system.
